sen.j: 憲実は儒学に志篤く、1432年以降には足利学校の再興に関与し、五経など書籍の寄進を行うなど文化事業に大きな功績を残している。
sen.e: Norizane had high motive for Confucianism, and since 1432, he had been involved in the reestablishment of Ashikaga School, and he also made a great achievement for cultural projects such as donating books including the Five Classics texts of Confucianism.
